description: SHOW HOME QUALITY townhouse at the sought-after Will by Marcon. This 3 level town blends style, comfort & location across 1565sf, feat. 4 beds, 4 baths, A/C, double garage, & magazine worthy design w/ stunning wide plank flooring, a timeless colour palette, kitchen with gas stove and sleek white upper & lower cabinetry. From the front door, you’re welcomed into a bright living room that flows seamlessly toward the kitchen & out to the patio & your own private yard with upgraded turf. Upstairs offers 3 spacious bedrms, lower level includes a 4th bed ideal for guests, a home office or gym. Walk to all levels of schools, Brewer’s Row, & Rocky Point or hop on the SkyTrain or West Coast Express, living that perfect Port Moody lifestyle that everyone knows about! OPEN HOUSE: Sat. Dec 20th 12-2pm
